Object.Field: SNP_MODFOLDER : ODS #SNP_MODEL : ODS #SNP_SUBMODEL : Global #SNP_TABLE : AUDITORIA #SNP_COL : SECUENCIAL
SNP_MODFOLDER : ODS #SNP_MODEL : ODS #SNP_SUBMODEL : Global #SNP_TABLE : USUARIO #SNP_COL : CODIGO

create table <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0IP", "W") ?> ( C1_IP VARCHAR2(20) NULL, C2_TIPOCLIENTE VARCHAR2(20) NULL, C3_IDENTIFICACIONCLIENTE VARCHAR2(20) NULL, C4_FECHA VARCHAR2(20) NULL, C5_FECHA_HORA VARCHAR2(25) NULL ) NOLOGGING

select DISTINCT AUDITORIA.IP C1_IP, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(USUARIO.NUMDOCUMENTO,1,1) IN ('E','G','I','J','P','R','V','M','F') THEN SUBSTR(USUARIO.NUMDOCUMENTO,1,1) ELSE 'P' END C2_TIPOCLIENTE, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(USUARIO.NUMDOCUMENTO,1,1) IN ('E','G','I','J','P','R','V','M','F') THEN SUBSTR(USUARIO.NUMDOCUMENTO,2,LENGTH(USUARIO.NUMDOCUMENTO)-1) ELSE USUARIO.NUMDOCUMENTO END C3_IDENTIFICACIONCLIENTE, TO_CHAR(AUDITORIA.FECHA, 'DD/MM/YYYY') C4_FECHA, TO_CHAR(AUDITORIA.FECHA, 'DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm:ss') C5_FECHA_HORA from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "AUDITORIA", "LS_ODS", "", "D")?> AUDITORIA, <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "USUARIO", "LS_ODS", "", "D")?> USUARIO where (1=1) And (AUDITORIA.CODOPERACION IN ('15','36')) And (AUDITORIA.FECHA between TO_DATE('#ODI_AT_SUDEBAN_DEV.FechainicioS','MM/DD/YY') and TO_DATE('#ODI_AT_SUDEBAN_DEV.FechafinS','MM/DD/YY'))
And (AUDITORIA.NUMTARJETAVIRTUAL=USUARIO.NUMTARJETAVIRTUAL)

insert /*+ append */ into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%COL_PRF0IP", "W") ?> ( C1_IP, C2_TIPOCLIENTE, C3_IDENTIFICACIONCLIENTE, C4_FECHA, C5_FECHA_HORA ) values ( :C1_IP, :C2_TIPOCLIENTE, :C3_IDENTIFICACIONCLIENTE, :C4_FECHA, :C5_FECHA_HORA )

create table <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "IP", "LS_AT_STG", "", "D") ?> ( IP VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, TIPOCLIENTE VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, IDENTIFICACIONCLIENTE VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, FECHA VARCHAR2(20) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?>, FECHA_HORA VARCHAR2(25) <?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL") ?> )
SNP_PROJECT : ODI_AT_SUDEBAN_DEV #SNP_TRT : IKM SQL Control Append

COMPONENT NAME: IKM SQL Control Append
AUTHOR: Oracle
Description : - Integration Knowledge Module - Integrates data in any ISO-92 compliant database target table in truncate / insert (append) mode. - Data can be controlled. Invalid data is isolated in the Error Table and can be recycled.
Restrictions: - When working with journalized data, if the "Synchronize deletions from journal" is executed, the deleted rows on the target are committed regardless of the COMMIT option - The TRUNCATE option is not implemented on all RDBMs - The TRUNCATE option cannot work if the target table is referenced by another table (foreign key) - When using the RECYCLE_ERRORS option, you have to set an Update Key for your interface. - When using this module with a journalized source table, data are automatically filtered to not include source deletions. - The FLOW_CONTROL and STATIC_CONTROL options call the Check Knowledge Module to isolate invalid data (if no CKM is set, an error occurs). Both options must be set to NO in the case when an Integration Interface populates a TEMPORARY target datastore.
Automatically attempts to insert data into the Target Datastore of the Interface
Commit all data inserted in the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to perform flow control.
Check this option to recycle data rejected by flow control in a previous execution of this interface.
Check this option to control the target table after having inserted or updated target data.
Check this option if you wish to truncate the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to delete all the rows of the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to create the target table
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary objects (tables, files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging.

<%if ( odiRef.getUserExit("FLOW_CONTROL").equals("1") ) { %> insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> ) select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",

	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> <% } else { %> insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> )
select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> FROM ( <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION] [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG <> 'D' <%} else {%> (1=1) <% } %> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%> ) <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> ODI_GET_FROM
<% } %>

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","JRN_NAME","A")%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

<%if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_METHOD"))){%> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "","((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> ) <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]", ",\n\t", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG <> 'D' <%} else {%> (1=1) <% } %> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%>

<%if ( odiRef.getUserExit("FLOW_CONTROL").equals("1") ) { %> insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","W")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "INS and REW")%> ) select DISTINCT <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "INS and REW")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> E where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","W")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= E.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "UK")%> ) and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' and E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>' <% } %>

COMPONENT NAME: CKM Oracle
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION - Check Knowledge Module for Oracle - This module controls the validity of the constraints of a Datastore and rejects the invalid records in an error table. It can be used for static controls as well as flow controls. - This module creates non unique index on the I$ table before checking AK and PK and an index on the E$ table before removing erroneous records from I$ table.
RESTRICTIONS - Data cleansing can be performed only if an update key is defined on the controlled table. - This Knowledge Module uses Oracle RowId column for data cleansing.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - DROP_ERROR_TABLE: When this option is set to YES, the error table will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This means that any rejected records, identified and stored during previous control operations, will be lost. - DROP_CHECK_TABLE: When this option is set to YES, the SNP_CHECK_TAB check table (which is created in the default Physical Schema of the Physical Server that hosts the controlled table) will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This table contains a collection of all rejected records retrieved from all datastores hosted on the same Physical Server (whatever the Physical Schema may be). - UPGRADE_ERROR_TABLE: When this option is set to YES, the existing E$ table will be upgraded to the new E$ table structure.

When this option is set to YES, the error table will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This means that any rejected records, identified and stored during previous control operations, will be lost.

When this option is set to YES, the SNP_CHECK_TAB check table (which is created in the default Physical Schema of the Physical Server that hosts the controlled table) will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This table contains a collection of all rejected records retrieved from all datastores hosted on the same Physical Server (whatever the Physical Schema may be).
Create Index on the error table

set this Option to Yes for creating a non unique indexes on the Error table.
Note: When error table is not dropped at every execution (DROP_ERROR_TABLE=Yes), insert performance into error table may decrease due to this index.

This option affects the use of PURGE key word:
Values PURGE 10 Yes 9 No

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.

In case you use this CKM in an Oracle DB 11R2 or later environment with Editions activated and data is accessed through editioning views instead of directly through tables, you should consider activating this option. Please see KM reference guide for details.
When this option is set to YES, the existing E$ table will be upgraded to the new E$ table structure.

delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME", "W")%> where SCHEMA_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("SCHEMA")%>' and ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' and ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>'

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) { 
/* No edition support needed */ %>
drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> <% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() >= 10 ) { out.print( "purge" ); }; %>
<% } else { 
/* Edition support needed */
%>
declare
	viewExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	tableExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	baseTableName	VARCHAR2(100 CHAR);
begin	
	-- Check, if old non-EV-support error table already exists
	select 	count('X') 
	into	tableExists
	from 	ALL_TABLES
	where 	OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
	and		TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%>';
	
	if tableExists > 0
		begin
			execute immediate 'drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> purge';
		end
	else
		begin
			-- Check, if error view already exists
			select 	count('X') 
			into	viewExists
			from 	ALL_VIEWS 
			where 	OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
			and		VIEW_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%>';
			
			if viewExists > 0
				begin
					select	OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME
					into 	baseTableName
					from 	ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS_AE
					where 	OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
					and		VIEW_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%>';
					and		EDITION_NAME = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name');
					
					execute immediate 'drop table '|| baseTableName ||' purge';
					execute immediate 'drop view <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> purge';
				end
			end if;
		end
	end if;
	
<%};%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) { /* No edition support needed */ %> create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> ( ODI_ROW_ID UROWID, ODI_ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] " + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"), ",\n\t", "", "")%>, ODI_ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_PK <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32", "")%> PRIMARY KEY, ODI_SESS_NO <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "19", "")%> ) <% } else { /* Edition support needed */ %> declare viewExists NUMBER(1,0); tableExists NUMBER(1,0); baseTableName VARCHAR2(100 CHAR); begin -- Check, if old non-EV-support error table already exists select count('X') into tableExists from ALL_TABLES where OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and TABLE_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2);
-- Check, if error view already exists select count('X') into viewExists from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS_AE where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2);
-- Generate a GUID base table name <? String tableName = java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString().toUpperCase().replace('-','_'); ?> baseTableName := '<?=odiRef.getObjectName("L","%ERR_PRF"+tableName, "W")?>';
if tableExists > 0 then execute immediate 'alter table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> to '|| baseTableName; else begin execute immediate 'create table '|| baseTableName ||' '|| '( ' || ' ODI_ROW_ID UROWID, ' || ' ODI_ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] " + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"), ",\n\t", "", "")%>, ' || ' ODI_ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_PK <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32", "")%> PRIMARY KEY, '|| ' ODI_SESS_NO <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "19", "")%>'
')'; end; end if;
-- Create EV view on Guid error table execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME","W")%> as ' || 'select ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ' || '<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "")%>, ' || 'ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE,ODI_PK,ODI_SESS_NO ' || 'from '|| baseTableName ;
end;
<%};%>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME", "W")%> ( SCHEMA_NAME, RESOURCE_NAME, FULL_RES_NAME, ERR_TYPE, ERR_MESS, CHECK_DATE, ORIGIN, CONS_NAME, CONS_TYPE, ERR_COUNT ) select '<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("SCHEMA")%>', '<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_NAME")%>', '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%>', E.ODI_ERR_TYPE, E.ODI_ERR_MESS, E.ODI_CHECK_DATE, E.ODI_ORIGIN, E.ODI_CONS_NAME, E.ODI_CONS_TYPE, count(1) from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> E where E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>' and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' group by E.ODI_ERR_TYPE, E.ODI_ERR_MESS, E.ODI_CHECK_DATE, E.ODI_ORIGIN, E.ODI_CONS_NAME, E.ODI_CONS_TYPE

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){ /* No Editioning View Support */ %> create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> ( CATALOG_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> , SCHEMA_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> , RESOURCE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, FULL_RES_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> , CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ERR_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> ) <% } else { /* Editioning View support enabled */ %>
DECLARE
oldtableExists NUMBER(1,0); newtableExists NUMBER(1,0);
BEGIN
-- Check, if old non-EV-support check table already exists select count('X') into oldtableExists from all_tables where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2);
-- Check, if EV-support check table already exists select count('X') into newtableExists from all_tables where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2)||'_AE';
IF oldtableExists > 0 THEN -- Auto-Upgrade from previous setup with ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT=No execute immediate 'alter table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> add EDITION_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "30", "0" )%> default sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'')'; execute immediate 'alter table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> to substr(''<%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>'', length(''<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>'')+2)_AE'; ELSIF newtableExists = 0 THEN -- Create table execute immediate 'create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>_AE (' || ' EDITION_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "30", "0" )%> default sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name''),' || ' CATALOG_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' SCHEMA_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> ,' || ' RESOURCE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' FULL_RES_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> ,' || ' CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ERR_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>' || ' )'; END IF;
-- Create view returning only check records of current edition execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> as' || ' select EDITION_NAME, CATALOG_NAME, SCHEMA_NAME, RESOURCE_NAME, FULL_RES_NAME, ERR_TYPE, ERR_MESS, CHECK_DATE, ORIGIN, CONS_NAME, CONS_TYPE, ERR_COUNT' || ' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>_AE' || ' where EDITION_NAME = sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'')'; END; <% }; %>

COMPONENT NAME: LKM SQL to Oracle
AUTHOR: Oracle
Description: - Loading Knowledge Module - Loads data from any ISO-92 database to an Oracle target database. - This module uses ODI Agent to read selected data from the database and write the result in the Oracle target temporary table created dynamically. - When using this module on a journalized source table, the Journaling table is first updated to flag the records consumed and then cleaned from these records at the end of the interface.
Restrictions: - Option WORK_TABLE_OPTIONS should be cleared for an Oracle 7 database
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary indexes after integration. This could be useful when the same sources tables are used in differents interfaces of a package.
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary objects (files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging.

Use this option if you wish to create the work table in nologging mode (transaction is not written to redolog files). This option is set by default to NOLOGGING (valid only from Oracle v8). WARNING : This option should be empty for Oracle v7 configurations

Version number of Oracle staging database.
Values PURGE 11 Yes 10 Yes 9 No 8 No

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%>
set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

<%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i, "", "[EXPRESSION]\t[ALIAS_SEP] [CX_COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%>

<% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() < 9 ) { %>
analyze table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "COLL_NAME", "W")%> estimate statistics
<% } else { %>
BEGIN DBMS_STATS.GATHER_TABLE_STATS ( ownname => '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>', tabname => '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","COLL_NAME","A").replaceAll("","").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll(odiRef.getInfo( \\u0022DEST_WORK_SCHEMA\\u0022 )+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022\\u0022)?>")%>', estimate_percent => DBMS_STATS.AUTO_SAMPLE_SIZE ); END;
<% }; %>

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

COMPONENT NAME: RKM Oracle
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION This KM retrieves the table and view structures in Oracle (columns, primary keys, alternate keys and references). This KM works for Oracle databases for Oracle versions 7.3 and later. This KM retreive also the Partition and Sub partition
REQUIREMENTS Required privileges for the connection user: SELECT on any dictionnary view ALL_* (eg. ALL_TABLES)
LIMITATIONS - When reversing tables/view at the same time as synonyms, user must not include synonyms, which point to tables/views, which are already in the model or which are also included for current reverse engineering run. This may lead to unique constraint violations e.g. for FK names.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - COMPATIBLE: Enable different features depending on the version of the reversed database - VAIDATE: Enable an automatic validation of the options specified for the KM - ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT: enable possible use of editioning views -SHORTCUT_HANDLING_MODE: Mode to handle shortcut

This option enables the reverse of INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND and INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH datatypes.
Values INTERVAL types reversed 9 Yes 8 No
It is recommended to use 9 on Oracle 9i and above.
This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE - validation of KM option SHORTCUT_HANDLING_MODE

In case you use this RKM in an Oracle DB 11R2 or later environment with Editions activated and data is accessed through editioning views instead of directly through tables, you should consider activating this option. Please see KM reference guide for details.

This mode will be applied to the cases where the base table of a shortcut does not match the database table.
This option has three possible values: ALWAYS_MATERIALIZE: Always materialize conflicted shortcuts. (default) ALWAYS_SKIP: Always skip conflicted shortcuts. PROMPT: Prompt

select fk.owner FK_USER_NAME, fk.table_name TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, pk.owner PK_USER_NAME, pk.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME, NVL(SUBSTR(FK.DELETE_RULE,1,1),'R') DEL_RULE, Decode(pk.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk where (instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 or instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0) and fk.constraint_type ='R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* retrieve FK constraints defined on the base table of an EV as a FK constraint of the EV itself */ %> and not exists ( select 'X' From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_editioning_views ev where fk.constraint_type ='R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and fk.owner(+) = ev.owner and fk.table_name = ev.table_name ) union select fk.owner FK_USER_NAME, ev.view_name TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, pk.owner PK_USER_NAME, pk.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME, SUBSTR(FK.DELETE_RULE,1,1) DEL_RULE From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_editioning_views ev where fk.constraint_type ='R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and fk.owner(+) = ev.owner and fk.table_name = ev.table_name <% } %> union select fk.owner FK_USER_NAME, sfk.synonym_name TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, pk.owner PK_USER_NAME, spk.synonym_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME, NVL(SUBSTR(FK.DELETE_RULE,1,1),'R') DEL_RULE, Decode(pk.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_synonyms sfk, all_synonyms spk where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and fk.constraint_type ='R' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and sfk.owner = spk.owner and sfk.table_owner = fk.owner and sfk.table_name = fk.table_name and spk.table_owner = pk.owner and spk.table_name = pk.table_name and sfk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and sfk.synonym_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and spk.synonym_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, :STATUS, '1', '1' )

<% /* first select for PK on table */ %> Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME, Decode(c.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* when using editioning views, avoid reverse here the EV PK */ %> and c.status = 'ENABLED' <% } %> union Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME, Decode(c.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints c, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.owner = SY.TABLE_OWNER and c.table_name = SY.TABLE_NAME and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* reverse PK defined on base table if this select is modified, do not forget the not exists in the next union below */ %> union Select ev.view_name TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME, Decode(c.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints c, all_editioning_views ev where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and c.owner(+) = ev.owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name union <% /* reverse PK on EV if nothing on the base table */ %> Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME From all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and c.status = 'DISABLED' and not exists ( Select 'X' From all_constraints c, all_editioning_views ev where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and c.owner(+) = ev.owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name ) <% } %>

Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, co.constraint_name KEY_NAME, co.column_name COL_NAME, co.position POS From all_cons_columns co, all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and co.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and co.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and co.owner = c.owner and co.table_name = c.table_name and co.owner = c.owner and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and co.constraint_name = c.constraint_name UNION Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, co.constraint_name KEY_NAME, co.column_name COL_NAME, co.position POS From all_cons_columns co, all_constraints c, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.owner = SY.TABLE_OWNER and c.table_name = SY.TABLE_NAME and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and co.owner = c.owner and co.table_name = c.table_name <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { %> UNION Select ev.view_name TABLE_NAME, co.constraint_name KEY_NAME, evcol.view_column_name COL_NAME, co.position POS From all_cons_columns co, all_constraints c, all_editioning_views ev, all_editioning_view_cols evcol where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and co.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and co.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and co.owner = c.owner and co.table_name = c.table_name and co.owner = c.owner and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and co.constraint_name = c.constraint_name and c.owner(+) = ev.owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name and evcol.owner(+) = ev.owner and evcol.table_column_name = co.column_name <% } %>

Select i.table_name TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, decode(i.UNIQUENESS,'UNIQUE','AK','I') CONS_TYPE From all_indexes i where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and i.TABLE_OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and I.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) union Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, decode(i.UNIQUENESS,'UNIQUE','AK','I') CONS_TYPE From all_indexes i, all_synonyms sy where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and SY.TABLE_OWNER = i.TABLE_OWNER and SY.TABLE_NAME = i.TABLE_NAME and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* retrieve uniqueness constraints defined on the base table of an EV as an AK constraint of the EV itself */ %> union Select i.table_name TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, decode(i.UNIQUENESS,'UNIQUE','AK','I') CONS_TYPE From all_indexes i, all_editioning_views ev where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and i.TABLE_OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and I.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and i.table_name = ev.table_name and i.owner(+) = ev.owner and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) <% } %>

insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

Select ic.table_name TABLE_NAME, ic.index_name KEY_NAME, ic.column_name COL_NAME, ic.column_position POS From all_ind_columns ic, all_indexes i where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and ic.index_owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ic.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ic.TABLE_owner = i.TABLE_OWNER and ic.table_name = i.table_name and ic.index_name = i.index_name and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c Where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) union Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, ic.column_name COL_NAME, ic.column_position POS From all_ind_columns ic, all_indexes i, all_synonyms SY where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and SY.TABLE_OWNER = i.TABLE_OWNER and SY.TABLE_NAME = i.TABLE_NAME and ic.TABLE_owner = i.TABLE_OWNER and ic.table_name = i.table_name and ic.index_name = i.index_name and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') )

Select table_name CK_TABLE_NAME, constraint_name CK_NAME, search_condition CK_COND From all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type ='C' and constraint_name not like 'SYS%'

Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME CK_TABLE_NAME, constraint_name CK_NAME, search_condition CK_COND From all_constraints c, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.owner = SY.TABLE_OWNER and c.table_name = SY.TABLE_NAME and c.constraint_type = 'C' and constraint_name not like 'SYS%'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT, PARTITION_METH, SUB_PARTITION_METH ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, :TABLE_DESC, '1', :R_COUNT, :PARTITIONING_TYPE, :SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE
)

Select t.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, t.TABLE_NAME RES_NAME, replace(t.TABLE_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, substr(tc.COMMENTS,1,250) TABLE_DESC, 'T' TABLE_TYPE, t.NUM_ROWS R_COUNT, SUBSTR(PARTITIONING_TYPE ,1,1) PARTITIONING_TYPE, SUBSTR(SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE,1,1) SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE From ALL_TABLES t, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc, ALL_PART_TABLES tp Where t.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and tc.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and tp.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tp.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")) {%> and not exists (select 'X' from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS ev where ev.OWNER = t.OWNER and ev.TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME) <% } %> union Select s.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, s.SYNONYM_NAME RES_NAME, replace(s.SYNONYM_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, substr('<<SYNONYM FOR TABLE: ' || T.OWNER || '.' || T.TABLE_NAME || '>> ' || tc.COMMENTS,1,250) TABLE_DESC, 'SY' TABLE_TYPE, t.NUM_ROWS R_COUNT, SUBSTR(PARTITIONING_TYPE ,1,1), SUBSTR(SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE,1,1) From ALL_TABLES t, ALL_SYNONYMS s, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc, ALL_PART_TABLES tp Where s.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and s.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and t.OWNER = s.TABLE_OWNER and t.TABLE_NAME = s.TABLE_NAME and tc.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and tp.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tp.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")) {%> and not exists (select 'X' from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS ev where ev.OWNER = s.OWNER and ev.TABLE_NAME = s.TABLE_NAME) <% } %>

Insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, RES_NAME, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_DESC, TABLE_TYPE, IND_SHOW ) Values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_DESC, :TABLE_TYPE, '1' )

Select v.VIEW_NAME TABLE_NAME, v.VIEW_NAME RES_NAME, replace(v.VIEW_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, substr(vc.COMMENTS,1,250) TABLE_DESC, 'V' TABLE_TYPE From ALL_VIEWS v, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS vc, ALL_OBJECTS o Where v.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and v.VIEW_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and vc.OWNER(+) = v.OWNER and vc.TABLE_NAME(+) = v.VIEW_NAME and o.OWNER = v.OWNER and o.OBJECT_NAME = v.VIEW_NAME and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'VIEW' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { %> and not exists (select 'X' from all_editioning_views ev where ev.owner = v.owner and ev.view_name = v.view_name) union Select ev.VIEW_NAME TABLE_NAME, ev.VIEW_NAME RES_NAME, replace(ev.VIEW_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, substr(tc.COMMENTS,1,250) TABLE_DESC, 'V' TABLE_TYPE From ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS ev, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc Where ev.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ev.VIEW_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and tc.OWNER(+) = ev.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = ev.VIEW_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 <% } %>
insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

select TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE PART_DESC from ALL_TAB_PARTITIONS where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and TABLE_OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

SELECT SY.SYNONYM_NAME, ATP.PARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE from ALL_TAB_PARTITIONS ATP JOIN ALL_SYNONYMS SY ON ( sY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ATP.TABLE_OWNER = SY.TABLE_OWNER and ATP.TABLE_NAME = SY.TABLE_NAME ) where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PAR_PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :SUBPARTITION_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

select TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, SUBPARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE PART_DESC from ALL_TAB_SUBPARTITIONS where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and TABLE_OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PAR_PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :SUBPARTITION_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

SELECT SY.SYNONYM_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, SUBPARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE PART_DESC from ALL_TAB_SUBPARTITIONS ATP JOIN ALL_SYNONYMS SY ON ( sY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ATP.TABLE_OWNER = SY.TABLE_OWNER and ATP.TABLE_NAME = SY.TABLE_NAME ) where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_HEADING, COL_DESC, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( <%=odiRef.getModel("ID")%>, :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_HEADING, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', '1' )

select c.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, <% if ("8".equals(odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE"))) {%> c.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, <% } else { %> case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL DAY(%) TO SECOND(%)' then 'INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL YEAR(%) TO MONTH' then 'INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0)' then 'TIMESTAMP(0)' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)' then 'TIMESTAMP' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' else c.DATA_TYPE end DT_DRIVER, <% } %> substr(c.COLUMN_NAME,1,35) COL_HEADING, substr(cc.COMMENTS,1,250) COL_DESC, c.COLUMN_ID POS, case when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' then c.DATA_PRECISION when C.DATA_TYPE = 'CHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NCHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then c.DATA_SCALE else nvl(c.DATA_PRECISION,c.DATA_LENGTH) end LONGC, case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then NULL else c.DATA_SCALE end SCALEC, decode(c.NULLABLE,'Y','0','1') COL_MANDATORY from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS c, ALL_COL_COMMENTS cc, ALL_OBJECTS o Where o.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ( ( o.OBJECT_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 ) or ( o.OBJECT_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'VIEW' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 ) ) and cc.OWNER(+) = c.OWNER and cc.TABLE_NAME(+) = c.TABLE_NAME and cc.COLUMN_NAME(+) = c.COLUMN_NAME and o.OWNER = c.OWNER and o.OBJECT_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME UNION select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, <% if ("8".equals(odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE"))) {%> c.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, <% } else { %> case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL DAY(%) TO SECOND(%)' then 'INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL YEAR(%) TO MONTH' then 'INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0)' then 'TIMESTAMP(0)' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)' then 'TIMESTAMP' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' else c.DATA_TYPE end DT_DRIVER, <% } %> substr(c.COLUMN_NAME,1,35) COL_HEADING, substr(cc.COMMENTS,1,250) COL_DESC, c.COLUMN_ID POS, case when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' then c.DATA_PRECISION when C.DATA_TYPE = 'CHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NCHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then c.DATA_SCALE else nvl(c.DATA_PRECISION,c.DATA_LENGTH) end LONGC, case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then NULL else c.DATA_SCALE end SCALEC, decode(c.NULLABLE,'Y','0','1') COL_MANDATORY from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS c, ALL_COL_COMMENTS cc, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and C.OWNER = SY.TABLE_OWNER and C.TABLE_NAME = SY.TABLE_NAME and cc.OWNER(+) = C.OWNER and cc.TABLE_NAME(+) = C.TABLE_NAME and cc.COLUMN_NAME(+) = C.COLUMN_NAME
